PRE-PLACEMENT TRAINING PROGRAMMES CONDUCTED
The Training Program generally deals with all the aspects of soft skills required by any individual to face an interview process. The duration of the program is around 40hours in which the following aspects are dealt with
->Aptitude (Arithmetic,Reasoning & Verbal)
->Presentation Skills
->Interpersonal & Behavioral Skills
->Resume Building Skills
->Group Discussion Skills
->Interview Skills

ADMISSION PROCEDURE
Eligibility Criteria for admission of UG Programme:
Last Year 2019-20 EAMCET CUTOFF RANK  CMR College of Engineering & Technology is amongst the most competitive colleges when it comes to the admissions. The following is the criteria for the admission:
70% Admissions are taken under Convener Quota.
To seek admission into first year of four-year B.Tech course in any branch, he/she must satisfy the following requirements:
A student must have passed the Intermediate Examination of the Board of Intermediate Education,   Telangana with Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry as optional subjects, or any other examination recognized by the Government of Telangana as its equivalen
All the eligible candidates for admission into First Year shall have to qualify in the EAMCET Examination conducted by the Govt. of Telangana. The candidates will be admitted by EAMCET Convener strictly in accordance with the rank secured at the Entrance Examination and keeping the rules applicable in view, regarding the reservation of seats of various categories of candidates
 MANAGEMENT QUOTA
30% of the total seats will be considered under Management Quota.To seek admission under Management Quota, he/she must satisfy the following requirements.
A student should either have obtained a rank or should have secured a minimum aggregate percentage of 50% in group subjects (Maths, Physics and Chemistry) in the Intermediate Examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Telangana or any other examination recognized by the Government of Telangana as its equivalent.
30% of the total seats will be considered under Management Quota.
For Notification of B category : CLICK HERE!
For Application Form of B category : CLICK HERE!
Note:No reservation based or any other concession will be given under Management Quota.
The following is EAMCET counselling code which might be useful for the students applying for the college:
CMR College of Engineering & Technology, EAMCET counselling code: CMRK
M.TECH – Eligibility Requirements:
A Bachelor’s degree in Engineering/Technology of Any Recognized University in the concerned discipline.
AMIE/AMIETE or similar qualifications recognized by UPSC as equivalent to B.E./B.Tech.
A student should either have obtained a rank or should have secured a minimum aggregate percentage of 50% in group subjects (Maths, Physics and Chemistry) in the Intermediate Examination of the Board of Intermediate Education, Government of Telangana or any other examination recognized by the Government of Telangana as its equivalent.
Valid GATE Score obtained in the GATE Examination.
Apart from requirements of qualifications as stated in the above, the admissions of sponsored candidates shall be taken.
The number of Sponsored candidates shall not be more than two in each specialization and not more than five in each department.
These seats are considered as supernumerary.
He / She must be permanent employee with the sponsoring agency for at least (2) years, after obtaining the qualifying degree.
The sponsoring agency must be a Government establishment or a public-sector undertaking, or a reputed private undertaking.
The sponsoring agency shall-certify that the candidates will be granted leave for pursuing the M.TECH. Full-Time course.
The candidates should satisfy local/non-local status requirement as laid down in the TS Educational institutions (Regulation of Admissions) Order 1974 as amended from time to time.
M.B.A – Eligibility Requirements:
A candidate seeking admission into Two year MBA programme must satisfy the following criteria:
A pass in bachelor’s degree in any field with 45% marks in aggregate.
Must have qualified in Integrated Common Entrance Test (ICET) conducted by TS State Council of Higher Education, Govt of TS.
The candidates should satisfy local/non-local status requirement as laid down in the TS Educational institutions (Regulation of Admissions) Order 1974 as amended from time to time.
The candidates will be admitted strictly in accordance with the merit secured at the ICET.
The Convener admits 70% of the intake to the MCA program based on the ICET rank.
The Management admits the remaining 30% under Management and NRI quota.

SCHOLARSHIPS
The College has been prompt and generous in recognizing, appreciation and encouraging the meritorious students towards excellence in curricular and extracurricular activities. Special Cash Prizes are awarded to the students securing ranks and prizes in: Paper Presentation in Symposia / Conference, Quiz etc,. Cash Prizes, Certificate of Appreciation and medals are awarded for the Students securing first, second and third rank in every year in their respective examinations.

The following awards are given to students on the eve of Annual Day every year.Cash prize for meritorious Students in the respective of Every Branch/Course

 First Prize :Rs. 2500/- (1st Position in the Respective Department)

Second Prize :Rs. 2000/- (2nd Position in the Respective Department)

 Third Prize :Rs. 1500/- (3rd Position in the Respective Department)
